body_html: The in-process session (i.e. tf.Session() with no arguments) is not designed to be fork()-safe. If you want to share a set of devices between multiple processes, create a tf.train.Server in one process, and create sessions that connect to that server (with tf.Session("grpc://...")) in the other processes.

body: The in-process session (i.e. `tf.Session()` with no arguments) is not designed to be `fork()`-safe. If you want to share a set of devices between multiple processes, create a [`tf.train.Server`](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.8/api_docs/python/train.html#Server) in one process, and create sessions that connect to that server (with `tf.Session("grpc://...")`) in the other processes.
